ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lgamucov.u | |- U = { x e. CC | ( ( abs ` x ) <_ r /\ A. k e. NN0 ( 1 / r ) <_ ( abs ` ( x + k ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | lgamucov.a | |- ( ph -> A e. ( CC \ ( ZZ \ NN ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lgamucov | |- ( ph -> E. r e. NN A e. ( ( int ` ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) ` U ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_cnfldtop | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. Top |
| 6 |  | #P_ssrab2 | |- { x e. CC | ( ( abs ` x ) <_ r /\ A. k e. NN0 ( 1 / r ) <_ ( abs ` ( x + k ) ) ) } C_ CC |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_eqsstri | |- U C_ CC |
| 8 | 3 | #P_cnfldtopon | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_toponunii | |- CC = U. ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ntrss2 | |- ( ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. Top /\ U C_ CC ) -> ( ( int ` ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) ` U ) C_ U ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 10 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( int ` ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) ` U ) C_ U |
| 12 | 11 | #P_sseli | |- ( A e. ( ( int ` ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) ` U ) -> A e. U ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_reximi | |- ( E. r e. NN A e. ( ( int ` ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) ` U ) -> E. r e. NN A e. U ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> E. r e. NN A e. U ) |
